metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15575 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In Redmine before 3.2.6 and 3.3.x before 3.3.3, Redmine.pm lacks a check for whether the Repository module is enabled in a project's settings, which might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive differences information or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: redmine package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
